title: Ghost of a Tale
notes: need to use the following settings: "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11": "1" and "PROTON_NO_ESYNC": "1" you can find this setting file in .steam/steamapps/common/Proton(version)/

title: Ghost of a Tale
notes: No fullscreen, characters won't render, and no controller support.

title: Ghost of a Tale
notes: dxvk and esync wine need to be disabled. esync causes an instant crash and dxvk causes character models to not render. need to set the following as launch options: PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%
specs: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20GHz × 4 / Radeon RX 560

notes: Game's picture flickers constantly, when I move it become all black with some rays of light that are shining down into the starting area.
